trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows menu or toolbar command item.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 菜单或工具栏命令项。

trans-unit.source: The MenuCommand class represents information about a Windows menu or toolbar command.
trans-unit.target: MenuCommand 类表示有关 Windows 菜单或工具栏命令的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> interface allows you to add MenuCommand objects to the Visual Studio menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>接口，您可以将 MenuCommand 对象添加到 Visual Studio 菜单。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>

trans-unit.source: This class provides the following members: - An event-handler property to which you can attach an event handler for the command.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了以下成员:-可以在其中附加的事件处理程序命令的事件处理程序属性。

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> property that uniquely identifies the command.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>唯一标识该命令的属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A> method that executes the command.
trans-unit.target: -An<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>执行命令的方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A> method that can be overridden to handle the event that occurs when a new command is selected.
trans-unit.target: -An<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A>可以重写以处理在选择新的命令时发生该事件的方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OnCommandChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Boolean flag states that indicate whether the command is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -布尔型标志状态指示该命令是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A>，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A> property that indicates the OLE command status code for the command.
trans-unit.target: -An<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A>属性，该值指示 OLE 命令的命令的状态代码。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.OleStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An override for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -的替代<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The event to raise when the user selects the menu item or toolbar button.
trans-unit.target: 要在用户选择菜单项或工具栏按钮时会引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: The unique command ID that links this menu command to the environment's menu.
trans-unit.target: 此菜单命令链接到环境的菜单唯一命令 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选中此菜单项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果选中项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu command changes.
trans-unit.target: 菜单命令更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: A command can change if it becomes checked or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果将成为检查或禁用它，可以更改命令。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> associated with this menu command.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref>与此菜单命令关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> associated with the menu command.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"> </xref>与菜单命令相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this menu item is available.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此菜单项是否可用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command.
trans-unit.target: 调用该命令。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the command with the given parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用该命令与给定的参数。

trans-unit.source: An optional argument for use by the command.
trans-unit.target: 可选的参数以供该命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets the OLE command status code for this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 获取此菜单项的 OLE 命令状态代码。

trans-unit.source: An integer containing a mixture of status flags that reflect the state of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，它包含反映此菜单项的状态的状态标志的组合。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCommandChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCommandChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the public properties associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的公共属性<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: All menu commands store their public properties in the Properties collection.
trans-unit.target: 所有菜单命令属性集合中都存储其公共属性。

trans-unit.source: The key in the properties dictionary is the property name.
trans-unit.target: 属性字典中的键是属性名称。

trans-unit.source: This allows for generic enumeration of properties and provides a consistent substrate from which new properties can be added without modifying the class definition.
trans-unit.target: 这使泛型枚举的属性，并提供一致的基底，从中可以将新属性添加而无需修改的类定义。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the public properties of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含的公共属性<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is supported.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否支持此菜单项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is supported, which is the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果支持该项目，则这是默认设置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this menu command.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式此菜单命令。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.CommandID*> property appended with the names of any flags that are set, separated by pipe bars (|). These flag properties include <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Checked*>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Enabled*>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Supported*>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible*>.
trans-unit.target: 包含的值的字符串<> *1> 用竖线 (|) 分隔的属性的设置，任何标志的名称后追加。这些标志属性包括<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible*>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this menu item is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此菜单项是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该项是可见的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
